channel.title: Best Rock Solo?
channel.description:
Here, some solo's... Maybe some inspiration to all you, guitarists... go and vote!!
Stairway to heaven (Jimmy Page) for me :D
Greetz,
Jens

item.title: Best Rock Solo?
item.dc:creator: @Vahuka Vahuka
item.description:
@Vahuka wrote:

you DEFINITELY need master of puppets by Metallica (the second one)
that’s amazing

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rock Solo?
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“slayer215, post:13, topic:65086”]So…if a guitar solo is less than 20 years old then it is not good?[/quote] Yes, I mean, you can think a solo is good, but these songs are surviving for like 20 years… Some longer, some less, but they all pretty legendary !

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rock Solo?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Scar_Auto Mr Scar Auto
item.description:
@Mr_Scar_Auto wrote:

I like the solo in Black Sabbath’s Iron man, and Deep purple’s Black knight. Not particularly hard, but they sound rad.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rock Solo?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:9, topic:65086”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=94562.msg994033#msg994033 date=1173562816]

it’s only my 3th I’m planning to make more, I wanna know who’s hot and who not, to you guys oppinion Freebird is awsome, not that hard, once you got the technique…

more people these days wont even open a thread like this because they dont want to stray away from there “hardcore trance and r&b”

it’s hardcore gangsta rap… geesh get it right

no probs blud me and my homies are gangstas to the max, south south east side massive.
[/quote]

Why take the mic? We dont go around saying “oh rock on dude lets go to the mosh pit later!!!” So why are you so unhappy with other people having a taste in a different style of music?[/quote]
no you dont but i know alot of chavs who shout, from afar, EMOOO.
and im actually slandering the typical croydon/south london wiggers who beleive they are “gangsta’s”. im fine with rap… its a great style of music, just not my favorite.
see ali G in da house for the type of people im refering to.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rock Solo?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:8, topic:65086”][quote author=apzrman link=topic=94562.msg985280#msg985280 date=1173369444]

it’s only my 3th I’m planning to make more, I wanna know who’s hot and who not, to you guys oppinion Freebird is awsome, not that hard, once you got the technique…

more people these days wont even open a thread like this because they dont want to stray away from there “hardcore trance and r&b”

it’s hardcore gangsta rap… geesh get it right
[/quote]
no probs blud me and my homies are gangstas to the max, south south east side massive.[/quote]

Why take the mic? We dont go around saying “oh rock on dude lets go to the mosh pit later!!!” So why are you so unhappy with other people having a taste in a different style of music?

Read full topic
